Associate Professor of Finance

Address: 39 South College Road, Haidian District, Beijing, P.R.China 100081

Download CV

Welcome to my research page.

Research Interests

  • Labor and Finance, Corporate Finance, AI and Big Data

Education

  • Ph.D. in Finance, Tsinghua University, 2021
  • B.A. in Financial Engineering, Central University of Finance and Economics, 2015

Working papers

Stock Price Shocks and Skill Demand (2025)

  • with Yao Lu and Liu Yang
  • Selected Presentations: FMA 2025, CICF 2023

Investorsâ€™ Risk-taking Behaviors after â€œEscaping from Deathâ€ (2025)

  • with Xiaoying Xu
  • Selected Presentations: FMA 2025, Asian FA 2024

Publications

[1] Can investment incentives crowd out innovation? Evidence from China (with Shaowei Ke, Yao Lu, and Xinzheng Shi), Economic Development and Cultural Change, 2025, 73(3), 1023-1072.
[2] Margin Trading, Short Selling, and Information Asymmetry (with Minggang Xu and Xueyong Zhang), Journal of Financial Markets, 2024: 100926.
[3] Do CEO Digital Characteristics Matter for Corporate Investment Efficiency (with Wei Jing and Danqi Sun), Accounting & Finance, 2025, accepted.
[4] Mutual fund managersâ€™ timing abilities (with Li Liao and Xueyong Zhang), 2017, Pacific-Basin Finance Journal, 44: 80â€“96.
